name: chime-website
description: Official website for Chime - Social Alarms for Groups mobile app

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.generate-favicons: npm run generate-favicon-sizes && npm run generate-favicon-ico
scripts.generate-favicon-sizes: npx sharp-cli resize 16 16 -i src/assets/images/app-icon.png -o src/assets/images/favicon-16x16.png && npx sharp-cli resize 32 32 -i src/assets/images/app-icon.png -o src/assets/images/favicon-32x32.png && npx sharp-cli resize 180 180 -i src/assets/images/app-icon.png -o src/assets/images/apple-touch-icon.png && npx sharp-cli resize 192 192 -i src/assets/images/app-icon.png -o src/assets/images/android-chrome-192x192.png && npx sharp-cli resize 512 512 -i src/assets/images/app-icon.png -o src/assets/images/android-chrome-512x512.png
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test: npm run validate && echo 'All tests passed!'

author: Chime Team
